attributes.comment:
It is getting more and more frustrating that we as as hopeful adoptive parents and
US Citizens keep getting socked with USCIS fees; due to the timeline to adopt
and the short lenght of time our fingerprints are good, we will have to resubmit for
fingerprinting - all in all, having to redo will cost us an additional $1500 or so; in
addition to that we have to AGAIN pay the fees for I600A submission so take on
another $900 to the USCIS Office - especially with the proprposed increase.

PLEASE consider other options for adoptive parents! Either extend the length of
time fingerprints are good, or allow us to apply for extension for nominal fee - but
please don't increase the fees for applications at this time! The fees were just
increased when we started the process for our first daughter just 3 years ago and
now another one?

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Stacy DeLore
